h1_38: Montefiore Medical Center/Albert Einstein College of Medicine Program
h3_39: Montefiore Medical Center/Albert Einstein College of Medicine
p_64: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_68: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_79: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_97: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_100: Einstein Dermatology offers a thorough and robust curriculum in all aspects of dermatology including complex medical dermatology (both out-patient and in-patient), pediatric dermatology, cosmetic dermatology, dermatopathology, and dermatologic surgery. We also have a strong research program. We work to foster a collaborative and scholarly work environment to provide the highest level of training possible.

p_350: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
